editor-config-dialog.title: Editor Settings
editor-config-dialog.description: Change editor settings such as indentation, theme, and language.

export-dialog.title: Export
export-dialog.description: Anyone who has this link will be able to view this. It has already been copied. If you want to copy it again, please copy the link below.

import-dialog.title: Import
import-dialog.upload-card-description: Select a JSON file to visualize. The file will be parsed and displayed in the editor.

file-error.title: Error
file-error.fail-parse: Failed to parse file. The file is not in JSON or YAML format{message}
file-error.fail-format: Failed to format the file for better readability{message}

import-dialog.api-fetch-card-description: Enter a URL to fetch JSON data from a remote source.

api-fetch-error.title: Error
api-fetch-error.invalid-json: Body must be in valid JSON format
